reviewsList.name: Julia
reviewsList.reviewText: It was really super relaxing days with lots of peace and quiet. So if you need a little break, I can definitely recommend the tiny house.

reviewsList.name: Mark
reviewsList.reviewText: Absolutely loved it! Perfect getaway spot. Nice place but could use some updates. So if you need a little break, I can definitely recommend the tiny house.

reviewsList.name: Emily
reviewsList.reviewText: Absolutely loved it! Perfect getaway spot.
